title: Sufficient parking facilities and ancillary facilities for cars, buses, transport vehicles etc
clause_text: Sufficient parking facilities and ancillary facilities for cars, buses, transport vehicles etc. shall be provided on site.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Sufficient parking facilities and ancillary facilities for cars, buses, transport vehicles etc. shall be provided on site.
